en.activitiesPlaceholderText: Share this page and get backers and sponsors to support your collective!
en.becomeMemberText: With your support, you’ll help us cover all expenses the collective makes in order to keep going. All the funds will be managed responsibly with your help, and everyone can see how and where the funds are being spent!
en.defaultTierDescription: Your donation will help us continue our activities. Thank you for your support.
en.disclaimer: By clicking above, you are pledging to give
en.donationsList-showUpHere: All donations will show up here
en.expensesList-showUpHere: All expenses will show up here

en.wantToRaiseMoneyText:
With Open Collective, it's easy to raise money from individuals and sponsors. You can even charge membership fees. 

It's easy to spend the money you raise. Just submit a receipt and you'll get reimbursed via PayPal.
en.WeAreProudSupporters: We are proud supporters of these collectives

fr.activitiesPlaceholderText: Partagez cette page et recevez des dons de vos supporters et sponsors!
fr.becomeMemberText: Avec votre contribution, vous nous aidez à couvrir nos dépenses. Tous les fonds sont gérés de manière responsable et en toute transparence. Tout le monde peut voir comment on dépense l'argent récolté.

fr.hiThisIs: Bienvenue sur la page du collectif ouvert de

es.activitiesPlaceholderText: ¡Comparte esta página para recibir apoyos de aportantes y sponsors!
es.becomeMemberText: Tu aporte nos ayuda a cubrir nuestros gastos. Todos los fondos son utilizados de manera responsable y con total transparencia. Todos pueden ver como utilizamos los fondos obtenidos.
es.cancelAnytime: Se puede cancelar en cualquier momento

es.disclaimer: Haciendo click arriba, te comprometes a aportar

es.expensesList-showUpHere: Todos los gastos se verán aquí
es.expensesPlaceholderText: ¡Subir un gasto para ser reintegrado y mostrar como se utilizan los fondos recibidos!
es.expensesPlaceholderTitle: La transparencia es una gran cualidad
es.helpUsContinueOurActivities: ¡Tu aporte nos permite financiar las actividades de nuestro colectivo y seguir adelante!
es.howDoYouWantToBeShown: ¿Cómo quieres aparecer en nuestra página? (dejar vacío para mantenerse anónimo)
es.joinAndFulfil: Súmate y ayúdanos a impulsar nuestra misión
es.membersWallText: Éstos son los Aportantes y Sponsors que nos apoyan y nos permiten avanzar nuestra misión. No estaríamos aquí sin tu apoyo. ¡Muchas gracias!
es.membersWallTitle: Esto es posible gracias a ti

it.activitiesPlaceholderText: Condividi questa pagina per trovare sostenitori e finanziatori che vogliano supportare il tuo collettivo!
it.becomeMemberText: Col tuo supporto ci aiuterai a coprire tutte le spese che il collettivo sostiene per poter andare avanti. Tutti i fondi verranno gestiti responsabilmente con il tuo aiuto, ed ognuno può verificare come e quando i fondi verranno spesi!
it.defaultTierDescription: La tua donazione ci aiuterà a continuare le nostre attività. Grazie per il tuo supporto.
it.disclaimer: Cliccando qui sopra, ti impegni a dare ad
it.donationsList-showUpHere: Tutte le donazioni verranno visualizzate qui
it.expensesList-showUpHere: Tutte le spese verranno visualizzate qui
it.expensesPlaceholderText: Presenta una spesa, ottieni il rimborso e mostra come i fondi vengono spesi!
it.expensesPlaceholderTitle: La trasparenza è una grande qualità.
it.helpUsContinueOurActivities: Col tuo supporto, ci aiuterai a coprire tutte le spese che il collettivo sostiene per andare avanti!
it.howDoYouWantToBeShown: Come dovremmo visualizzarti sulla pagina? (Lascia vuoto per rimanere anonimo)
it.IamAProudSupporter: Sono un orgoglioso sostenitore di questi collettivi
it.joinAndFulfil: Unisciti a noi e aiutaci a portare a termine la nostra missione
it.membersWallText: Membri e finanziatori supportano orgogliosamente questo collettivo e ci permettono di continuare a perseguire i nostri obiettivi. Non saremmo qui se non fosse per queste fantastiche persone. Grazie infinite.
it.membersWallTitle: Questo è possibile grazie a te.
it.name: Nome
it.nowOnBackersWall: Ora sei sul Muro dei nostri sostenitori!

wwcode.becomeMemberText: With your support, you’ll help fund this catalytic movement. Donations directly support our programs and global development, ensuring that even more women have the opportunity to excel in tech careers. Funds will be responsibly managed, and everyone can see how they are being spent!
wwcode.helpUsContinueOurActivities: With your support, you’ll help us cover all the expenses this WWCode Network needs to keep going!
wwcode.membersWallText: The donations from supporters of this network allow us to keep going towards our mission. We would not be here if it weren’t for these amazing people. Thank you so much.
wwcode.membersWallTitle: This is possible thanks to you.

openfoodnetwork.joinAndFulfil: Support us and help us fulfill our mission
openfoodnetwork.membersWallText: Proud backers and sponsors support this collective and allow us to keep going towards our mission. We would not be here if it weren’t for these amazing people. Thank you so much.
openfoodnetwork.membersWallTitle: This is possible thanks to you.

opensource.joinAndFulfil: Support this collective and help bring sustainable funding to Open Source

hoodie.helpUsContinueOurActivities: With your support, you’ll help us cover Hoodie’s expenses towards our goal of becoming a fully independent, self-sustained Open Source community! Our expenses are low (stickers, hosting, some travel), but to sustain Hoodie in the long term, we need dedicated people to serve the community. Our milestones are: Part-time community manager position ($10,000+ per year), Part-time fundraising position ($20,000+ per year) and Full-time community manager position ($60,000+ per year)
hoodie.membersWallText: Your support allows us to keep going towards our mission. Thank you so much.

freeridetovote.helpUsContinueOurActivities: With your support, you will help more people get to the polling stations on November 8th to cast their vote.

wpsfo.helpUsContinueOurActivities: With your support, you’ll help build the local WordPress community! All funds are processed by OpenCollective and are managed through Exygy’s fiscal sponsorship
